text: UPDATED with Starz saying Reeves will appear in the series : The John Wick franchise is heading for the small screen. Starz and Lionsgate are teaming to develop The Continental, a television series adaptation of the highly successful Lionsgate film franchise. The project was announced today during Starz ’ s portion of the TCA winter press tour. The Continental will be set in the John Wick universe, focusing on the inner workings of the exclusive Continental Hotel which serves as a refuge for assassins. Starz Writer / producer Chris Collins ( Sons of Anarchy, The Wire, The Man in the High Castle ) will write the series and serve as showrunner.
